review: Love this stick.  Great TV shows.  Just wish there were more current movies...
author: Charles Burchell

review: I don't have a smart TV in my bedroom so this is the next best thing. Setup took literally minutes and I have had no issues or complaints so far. I would definitely recommend this.
author: Alero Adokpaye

review: It pauses for a few seconds maybe 5 times in an hour. How can that be remedied?
author: Carol Lavelle

review: Excellent streaming device - especially at $19 intro price.  However, it is worth regular price!
author: Ed Baugh

review: Switched from a Chromecast to the fire stick, best decision I could have made. First, the remote is fabulous it's so much easier to choose shows now. Second, I rarely lose signal like I did with the Chromecast which is one of the best features if you ask me. Lastly, I can finally watch HD videos from prime!! This might have convinced me to buy the higher end models, but for now I love this baby!
author: Jessica Harding
